alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 10 at 9:54AM PST until December 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Central and Eastern Lake County east of Summer Lake. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some areas will see snow accumulations under 1 inch. Blowing snow may accompany the strong wind gusts resulting in reduced visibility. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
